# Call for Proposals: Medium Trucks with Dump Box
## Tender Details
| **Attribute**                     | **Value**                                                                                         |
| :-------------------------------- | :----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Reference Number**              | WS3581392098- Doc3639628224                                                                 |
| **Amendment Number**              | 9                                                                                                 |
| **Publication Date**              | October 20, 2022                                                                                  |
| **Tender Closing Date**           | December 16, 2022, 2:00 p.m. EST (--**Note:** Closes sooner)                                        |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | None                                                                                             |
| **Expected Contract End Date**   | None                                                                                              |
| **Tender Status**                 | Expired                                                                                          |
| **Procurement Method**            | Competitive - Open bidding                                                                            |
| **Selection Criteria**            | Lowest Price                                                                                     |
| **Trade Agreements**              | Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) |
| **Region of Opportunity**         | National Capital Region (NCR)                                                                |
| **Contracting Entity**            | Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)                                                  |
| **Contact**                      | Valerie Matheson <valerie.matheson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>                                         |

## Background
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) requires two (2) Medium Trucks with Dump Box, delivered Duty Paid (DDP) to PSPC, 950 Ages Drive, Unit #A, Ottawa, Ontario, K1G 6B3. The estimated delivery period is between April 1, 2023, and March 31, 2024.

## Submission Requirements
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on December 16, 2022, by 2:00 p.m. EST. Late submissions will not be considered.

## Amendment to Closing Time
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time.

### Note:
